# NWProtocolFramer.StartResult

**Enumeration**

Results that you send to indicate the disposition of your protocol after receiving the call to start.

## Declaration

```swift
enum StartResult
```

## Start Results

- **NWProtocolFramer.StartResult.ready**: The protocol is immediately ready to send and receive data.
- **NWProtocolFramer.StartResult.willMarkReady**: The protocol will perform a handshake, preventing the overall connection from becoming ready until [doc://com.apple.network/documentation/Network/NWProtocolFramer/Instance/markReady()] is called.

## Handling Instance Lifetime

- **init(framer:)**: Initializes your custom framing protocol for use in one connection attempt.
- **start(framer:)**: Requests that your protocol set up its state and begin a handshake, if necessary.
- **wakeup(framer:)**: Delivers a scheduled wakeup event.
- **stop(framer:)**: Requests that your protocol send any final messages to close the connection.
- **cleanup(framer:)**: Indicates that your protocol should clean up all allocations before being deallocated.
- **label**: A label defined by your custom protocol for use in debugging.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
